    #!/usr/bin/env node
/**
 * @description A parser for egg lang files
 * @author Sebastian Tamayo Guzman <alu0101131108@ull.edu.es>
 * @since 31/03/2022
 */
'use strict';

const fs = require('fs');
const nearley = require("nearley");
const grammar = require("./src/grammar.js");

 /**
 * A function that parses a egg file
 * @param {string} origin The name of the origin file
 * @throws Will throw if there are errors in the program or if the files
 *     can't be opened
 * @returns The resulting ast as a string
 */
const parseFromFile = (origin) => {
  let output = "";
  try {
    let input = fs.readFileSync(origin, { encoding: 'utf8' });
    const parser = new nearley.Parser(nearley.Grammar.fromCompiled(grammar));
    parser.feed(input);
    let ast = parser.results[0];
    output = JSON.stringify(ast, null, 2);
  } 
  catch (e) {
    throw e;
  }
  return output;
};

module.exports = { parseFromFile };
